title: Is it true that Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose is alive? - Quora
tags: Freedom Fighters of the Indian Subcontinent

response.answer_text: No, Stupid People Tell us these things… But Yes It's 100% Clear That He Didn't Die in The 1945 Plane Crash. I Think that He Was Living in Disguise of Gumnami Baba (Bhagwanji) who died in 1985 in Faizabad.(Famous Real-Life Historian Anuj Dhar Has Stated this and also has written a book on this ,called INDIA'S BIGGEST COVERUP})

How can you believe such a statement. Will he remain incognito for 74 years, after the end of WW2? Will it match his character of bravery to remain hidden. There are many theories about him: He died in an air crash 2. He was imprisoned by USSR and kept in confinement in Siberia. 3. He came to India and remained incognito as “Gunami Baba”Indian Prime Minister in 1947 in a letter to British PM referred to him as “Your war criminal” The most possible explanation, if he did not die in the air crash is that he was imprisoned in Siberia by Stalin
